fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **Vivid Monochrome** â€” Choose another player. They become Astral and gain roleblock and redirect immunity that night. If they would attack someone tonight, they first unknowingly heal that player. If an effect would indirectly attack them, that effect fails.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Depending on the real-life season, you:
> - Autumn: Can't be framed or cleaned.
> - Winter: Are immune to indirect attacks.
> - Spring: Have a Basic autovest.
> - Summer: Have highest possible priority.
